query:
SELECT avt.id, avt.highlight_id, avt.status, avt.error_message, avt.created_at,
       ph.title, ph.duration, ph.audio_url
FROM avatar_video_tasks avt
LEFT JOIN podcast_highlights ph ON avt.highlight_id = ph.id
WHERE avt.status = 'failed'
ORDER BY avt.created_at DESC
LIMIT 3;
command:

WHERE avt.status = 'failed'
